item.title: Data Science vs. Data Analytics: Key Differences
item.description: Don’t be confused! Data science and data analytics are different concepts. Learn all about it here, so you’ll know exactly how they can work together.

item.title: Models for Time Series Forecasting
item.description: Understand time series forecasting — a way to or predict behaviors based on historical, timestamped data — with anomaly detection to prevent IT problems.

item.title: Business Intelligence (BI): What It Means for Your Organization
item.description: Learn how BI transforms raw data into actionable insights to drive decisions, boost efficiency, and enhance ROI.

item.title: Business Continuity vs. Business Resilience: What's The Difference?
item.description: Business resilience is a key trend this year, so let’s outline the differences between business continuity and resilience. Hint: one’s a process, one is much more.

item.title: Learn SPL command types: Efficient search execution order and how to investigate them
item.description: When performing searches, Splunk uses its own language, SPL (Search Processing Language). In this article, we will explain each type of SPL and show you the efficient order in which to run searches and how to use the Search Job Inspector, an investigative tool.

item.title: The Modern SIEM has come a long way from your Grandmother’s SIEM
item.description: Explore how modern SIEM solutions tackle scalability, alert fatigue, and advanced threat detection with automation, machine learning, and real-time insights for efficient SOC workflows.

item.title: Threat Detection, Explained
item.description: Threat detection is fundamental to any cybersecurity practice. Learn what this term means and how to get started with it in this article.

item.title: Leading or Lagging? Three Things That Will Move Observability for Financial Services Forward
item.description: Boost IT efficiency, scale faster, and enhance customer experiences with insights from Evolutio and Splunk Observability.

item.title: APAC in 2025: A Harder Look at AI, Data and Cybersecurity Standards
item.description: Splunk's Simon Davies dives into our Splunk Predictions 2025 report and breaks down three key trends that will be pertinent to the APAC region in the year ahead.

item.title: What is Observability? An Introduction
item.description: In this blog post, we'll look at definitions, best practices, and key concepts around Observability in IT.

item.title: What are SaaS, PaaS, & IaaS?
item.description: Yes, the cloud makes work better. But which cloud model is right for you? Understand how SaaS, PaaS, and IaaS works in this ultimate guide.

item.title: Telemetry 101: An Introduction To Telemetry
item.description: Telemetry is powerful data that can tell you all sorts of important information. Know what you can do with this useful data — get the full telemetry 101 here.

item.title: What Are SLMs? Small Language Models, Explained
item.description: Large language models have changed the world. What about small language models? Learn what SLMs are, how they differ from LLMs, and why SLMs are the future.

item.description: Tech & IT spending is on the rise in 2025 across the globe. Read more on investment trends and see which regions will spend the most.
